body.p: The exposure draft of 2002 proposed the disclosure of some ‘sources of measurement uncertainty’. In the light of comments received that the purpose of this disclosure was unclear, the Board decided:

li.p: to amend the subject of that disclosure to ‘sources of estimation uncertainty at the end of the reporting period’; and
to clarify in the revised Standard that the disclosure does not apply to assets and liabilities measured at fair value based on recently observed market prices (see paragraph 128 of IAS 1).
